scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: cleancss assets/css/style-d.css -o assets/dist/style-d.min.css --source-map && cleancss assets/css/style-m.css -o assets/dist/style-m.min.css --source-map
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs assets/js/main.js -o assets/dist/main.min.js --source-map && uglifyjs assets/js/vimeo.js -o assets/dist/vimeo.min.js --source-map && uglifyjs assets/js/html2canvas.js -o assets/dist/html2canvas.min.js --source-map
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run build:css -- --watch
